text:
We had a fantastic experience with this program. Our child joined the program for fitness and he developed a love for the game. The coaches are experts, fun, caring, and make it enjoyable for kids. The whole play time is full of fun and laughter while playing some serious football.
Also, a big shout out to the academy team who helped us out with our queries on many occasions. It was a breeze to connect with you.
Thank you Vivo Kids üôè
Fun class! My 3-year-old is always looking forward to Sunday morning. Dulwich is such a sheltered place with free parking. I would recommend to any parent.

Every pictures says it all. My daughter enjoyed every moment with the coaches there. She will always ask me when will the next session be. Looking forward to every single one of it. And only as a giveaway winner, we had so much fun. Will definitely sign up for my daughter soon together with her brother, my 3 years old son. Its not only playing with Vivo kids, its about learning new things as well. Thank you VIVO KIDS!

T joined Vivo kids when he was 2.5 years old and he absolutely loved the weekly activities and also the coaches, especially Coach Kai and Kai Bin. The activities were well thought out and captivates the attention of the kids. There is also good use of the various sports equipment. The venue is also very safe and comfortable for the young ones to have a good time.

We have been having our regular lessons at The Cage, Kallang and they are very enjoyable for our little one. The great thing about this location is that it is sheltered, with natural ventilation, hence lessons are possible during rain or shine. Coaches Kai and Kai Bin are patient with the children, and yet have good control over the pace of the class. Our child has become more sociable and is exposed to different types of sports during the class. Highly recommend VivoKids for parents who wish to engage their children meaningfully.
